casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Stephen KYPRIANIDES 26P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Stephen Kyprianides, for Kyprianides, Stephen. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of February 2018 by Defendant to Amend Notice of Appeal Based Upon a Constitutional Question: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018." Ervin, J. recused
